statements: DELETE FROM attractions WHERE location = 'New York' AND rating > 4.5;
DELETE FROM attractions WHERE location = 'London' AND rating > 4.0;
DELETE FROM tours WHERE tour_name = 'Historical Tour';
DELETE FROM attractions WHERE rating < 3.5 AND location = 'Paris';
DELETE FROM tours WHERE tour_name = 'Historical Tour' AND duration_hours > 4;
DELETE FROM tours WHERE name = 'Hiking Tour';
DELETE FROM activities WHERE price >= 100 AND location = 'Paris';
DELETE FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'Outdoor' AND price > 50.00;
